post.body: Well I'm an avid poker player and have lots of stories but wouldn't even know where to start, I play with some crazy people *L*
Flight of the Bumble Bee . . . forgot the composer though
We did have a couple of months of fall... temps only in the upper 70's and low 80's .. if you can call that fall *L*
Oh wow, is that today? Yiippeee!!
Twitter is cleaning up the spammers and bad accounts.. that's probably where the loss occurred, don't take it personally. :)
Thanks :) Now I don't feel so all alone *L*
He's 15, the age where he's an authority on everything. Thought you might enjoy his insight *L* Have a great day!
My son said about 300 every year if you sleep with your mouth open... eeewwww!!
Eeeewww!!
You probably already know, it's due to global warming. I had a whole class about climate this semester and now I know too much!
Well I've had enough fun for one night, g'night and have a great Monday!
Trying to set up phone calling application of Windblows LifeChat. Can MS find a less customer friendly company thanTelefonica? Any thoughts?
Just finished a bit of .htaccess work for a client... hard not to work when you've got a laptop and wireless.
Playdough with daughter. Does anyone else love the smell of playdough? I sure do!
So cold that my son had to leave the KC / Dolphins game at half time, said a lot of the crowd did!
I've developed an affinity for QVC *L* Just bought my 3rd gift from them, guaranteed delivery by 12/24. Such a deal!! *L*
Good Morning! I started the day by updating my blog with a new post about WIIFY - read about it here: http://tinyurl.com/7wzwrc
Finally finished the 2009 Website & Internet Marketing Checklist... get yours here: http://tinyurl.com/9o9b83
Good Saturday Morning! Anyone else feeling the end of year crunch?
Whoever it was that posted the Quickbooks sale at Amazon earlier today - big thanks!!
